page.title: 08Survey Details
page.content: The area we surveyed is rural. Apart from isolted farms and small settlements most of the housing borders the Ashford Hill - Kingsclere roads. We sent out questionnaires to 80 households which were accessible from this road to try and get a picture of the type of life they lead.There are many large houses (41% of the households have over an acre of land ) and there is also a Council estate. 80% of the houses are owner /occupied and most of the 20% rented housing is probably the council estate. The oldest house in the area is 500 years old, 24 houses are between 50-100 years old and the rest have been built since world war 2.
